## Small Data 

From Kery blue book - chp 18 black adders?

```{r}
N <- 30
x1 <- rnorm(N, 0, 1)
x2 <- rnorm(N, 0, 0.8)

b0 <- log(2)
b1 <- 1.2
b2 <- -0.8

log_lam <- b0 + b1 * x1 + b2 * x2
lam <- exp(log_lam)
set.seed(13984)
counts <- rpois(30, lam)
pres <- ifelse(counts > 0, 1, 0)

df <- data.frame(counts, pres, x1, x2)
```
